javax.money.format

Class AmountFormatContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.money.AbstractContext
      • javax.money.format.AmountFormatContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class AmountFormatContext
extends AbstractContext
    The AmountFormatContext provides details about a MonetaryAmountFormat.
    Author:
    Anatole Tresch
    See Also:
    MonetaryAmountFormat.getContext(), Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getFormatName

        public String getFormatName()
        Access the style's Locale.
        Returns:
        the Locale, never null.

      • getLocale

        public Locale getLocale()
        Access the context's Locale.
        Returns:
        the Locale, or null.

      • getParseFactory

        public MonetaryAmountFactory<?> getParseFactory()
        Access the format's MonetaryAmountFactory that is used to of new amounts during parsing. If not set explicitly, the default MonetaryAmountFactory is used.
        Returns:
        the MonetaryAmountFactory, never null.

      • toBuilder

        public AmountFormatContextBuilder toBuilder()
        Creates a new builder instances, initialized with the data from this one.
        Returns:
        a new AmountFormatContextBuilder instance, never null.
